commands.name: deal
commands.description: Search for deals on your favourite games.

commands.name: store
commands.description: Search stores for deals. (Supports limited stores)

commands.name: free
commands.description: Search stores for free games! (Supports limited stores)

commands.name: clean
commands.description: Clean recent messages from the bot and commands to do with the bot.

commands.name: help
commands.description: View available commands to use with this bot and get help with specific commands

commands.name: region
commands.description: Set the region to search for game deals for. This is a channel specific setting.
commands.long_description:
Possible regions are as follows (case insensitive):
```AU2
BR2
CA
CN
EU1
EU2
RU
TR
UK
US```
